attributes.action: Ban tumble dryers for people with gardens - don't pick on people who like light bulbs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tumble Dryers use 30 times the amount of energy per hour than a 100 watt incandescent light bulb.  Tumble dryers should be banned for people who have gardens to dry their washing to show that this government is not just picking on people who like a certain kind of light.
